actions.name: build-local-latest
actions.description: Build a local copy tagged with latest, so we can do local testing easily

actions.name: ci-build-publish
actions.command: . ./config.env && TAG=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | sed s%/%-%g) && act -W $ATILS_INSTALL_DIR/.github/workflows/custom-containers-local-build-push.yaml --input image=buildarr --input tags=$IMAGE_NAME:$TAG --secret-file $ATILS_INSTALL_DIR/.github/workflows/.secrets -C $ATILS_INSTALL_DIR
actions.description: Local action to build and publish an image, tagged with the current branch
